title: Process a Standard Guest Check-out
description: A guest is at the front desk and wishes to check out of their room.

tasks.description: Retrieve the guest's folio using their room number.
Review the charges with the guest and confirm the total balance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly presents the final bill to the guest.

tasks.description: Process the final payment using the credit card on file and provide the guest with a printed receipt.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully closes the folio, processes payment, and provides a receipt.
